project.name: api-doc (API docs)
project.description:
The api-doc module contains the API documentation in RST text resource files.
All command plugins should also have an API doc string stored in an RST documentation file located in this directory structure, according to the command name.
Structure layout:
resources/ python/ # documentation for python client entity/ function1.rst function2.rst
Example: "frame/add_columns" plugin should have a file
api-doc/src/main/resources/python/frame/add_columns.rst
test/entity/function.rst is used by unittests, and serves as an example
